content.query:
CREATE DATABASE updatalakehouse_trabajofinal;
GO

USE updatalakehouse_trabajofinal;
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 2: Creacion de dataset por zona de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA master_transaction AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA business_knowa AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Paso 3: Asignación de clave de encriptación y formato de tablas externas
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'p39248J#asdasdiu89yuj1k29sdd'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '?sv=2021-12-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-06-10T06:19:50Z&st=2023-05-01T22:19:50Z&spr=https&sig=WbRvttB1FZ7bNe8yMqwkkPTpICG6tarHomtvDTaqQX0%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ExternalUPDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://dlsupdskuafdevi5l.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = UPUserIdentity
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPParquetFileFormat 
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Paso 4: Copia de Master a Business
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Geologia
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/trabajofinal/m_geologia1.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_transaction.dim_geologia(
    Estimacion nvarchar(200),
    Estatus nvarchar(200),
    Nombre_de_Estructura nvarchar(200),
    Full_Year_Budget float,
    Budget_YTD_April float,
    Actual_YTD_April float,
    Detalle nvarchar(200),
    Observacion nvarchar(200),
    ActualVSFullYearBudget float,
    ActualVSBudgetApril float
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/trabajofinal/m_geologia1.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03 -- Validación
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_transaction.dim_geologia
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 04
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_geologia
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/trabajofinal/geologia/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT * FROM master_transaction.dim_geologia;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_geologia;

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Geomecanica
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/trabajofinal/m_geomecanica1.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_transaction.dim_geomecanica(
    Estimacion nvarchar(200),
    Estatus nvarchar(200),
    Nombre_de_Estructura nvarchar(200),
    Full_Year_Budget float,
    Budget_YTD_April float,
    Actual_YTD_April float,
    Detalle nvarchar(200),
    Observacion nvarchar(200),
    ActualVSFullYearBudget float,
    ActualVSBudgetApril float
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/trabajofinal/m_geomecanica1.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03 -- Validación
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_transaction.dim_geomecanica
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 04
-----------------------------------------------

WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/trabajofinal/geomecanica/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_geomecanica;

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Oportunidades
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/trabajofinal/m_oportunidades1.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_transaction.dim_oportunidades(
    Estimacion nvarchar(200),

 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/trabajofinal/m_oportunidades1.parquet',

GO
-----------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_oportunidades;

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Planeamiento
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/trabajofinal/m_planeamiento1.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_transaction.dim_planeamiento(
    Estimacion nvarchar(200),

-----------------------------------------------

--Paso 04
-----------------------------------------------

WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/trabajofinal/planeamiento/',

    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_planeamiento;

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Retrasos_Operativos
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/trabajofinal/m_retrasos_operativos1.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_transaction.dim_retrasos_operativos(
    Estimacion nvarchar(200),

 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/trabajofinal/m_retrasos_operativos1.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03 -- Validación
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_transaction.dim_retrasos_operativos
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 04
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_retrasos_operativos
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/trabajofinal/retrasos_operativos/',

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_retrasos_operativos;
